head.title: VisualDCT Release Notes

modification.section: Package C (full graphical hierarchy support) release candidate.

head.scope: This document is contains release notes of the current build.
head.audience: The audience of this document are all users of this VisualDCT build.

section.title: Release Notes
section.p:
Changes in current version:
Morphing.
DrawingSurface canvas size.
Popup for common actions.
Linking bugfix.
Create command line tool for flatterning hierarchical databases.
User settable screen pan direction.
Local/global macro property.
Resize (move record up) record text area and not move link area.
Macros aren't always substituted.
Produce hierarchical names like Capfast.
Storing DBD path names.
Allow option on record name lenght limit.
Double-click problem.
Printing large databases at a small zoom (text readability problem).
Connectors undo managing.
Link Highlighting.
Speed up move.
External links have wrong description.
... and bugfixes.

Disabilities/missing:
include statement is implemented, but saving files containing include statements will also include all the content of includes files.
multiple template definitions in one DB are not supported
user's manual to be completed

Still there are quite a lot of ideas and nice features to be implemeted in the next releases:
search for objects
better printing support
pure Java CA debugging plug-in
...
